Chapter 7 Trustee's Report of No Distribution: I, YVETTE WEINSTEIN, having been appointed trustee of the estate of the above-named debtor(s), report that I have neither received any property nor paid any money on account of this estate; that I have made a diligent inquiry into the financial affairs of the debtor(s) and the location of the property belonging to the estate; and that there is no property available for distribution from the estate over and above that exempted by law. Pursuant to Fed R Bank P 5009, I hereby certify that the estate of the above-named debtor(s) has been fully administered. I request that I be discharged from any further duties as trustee. Key information about this case as reported in schedules filed by the debtor(s) or otherwise found in the case record: This case was pending for 1 months. Assets Abandoned: $ 102017.00, Assets Exempt: Not Available, Claims Scheduled: $ 284000.80, Claims Asserted: Not Applicable, Claims scheduled to be discharged without payment: $ 284000.80. (WEINSTEIN, YVETTE) (Entered: 11/10/2009)
